text: Three for Breakfast is a 1948 American animated short film directed by Jack Hannah. ==Voice cast== *Clarence Nash as Donald Duck *James MacDonald as Chip *Dessie Flynn as Dale ==Releases== *1948 - original theatrical release *2002 - Lilo & Stitch re-release ==Home media== The short was released on December 11, 2007, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Three: 1947-1950. Additional releases include: *1983 - Chip 'n' Dale (with Donald Duck) (VHS) *2004 - Chip 'n' Dale Volume 2: Trouble in a Tree (DVD) *2005 - Starring Chip 'n' Dale (DVD) ==References== Category:Donald Duck
title: Three for Breakfast
